channel.title: Cleveland Force Soccer Club Newsletters

item.title: The Force Effect - September 2021
item.author: Everett Palache
item.description: Our September newsletter edition highlights: College Placement with CFSC, ECNL Boys & Girls, CFSC Player Pathway, HundredX Funding Campaign - Ends September 13th!

item.title: The Force Effect - October 2021
item.author: Everett Palache
item.description: This month's edition highlights: CFSC & Girl Thriving Program Partnership; Playing Soccer vs Playing At Soccer; CFSC Vision: Education and Player Pathways; Soccer Today - CFSC Education Department; What's Next? Upcoming CFSC Events.

item.title: The Force Effect - November 2021
